articles.description: DeMarcus Cousins and Markieff Morris, who took Cousins' roster spot on the Lakers last season, were both ejected from Sunday's game.
articles.content: The Los Angeles Lakers exchanged DeMarcus Cousins' roster spot for Markieff Morris back in February. In Cousins' first game against his former team Sunday, he and Morris got in a testy exchange of th… [+3180 chars]

articles.content: Majak Daw is excited to link up with his younger brother, and former Kangaroos teammate Brent Harvey, after signing to play footy with North Heidelberg in 2021.Unable to secure a second chance in the… [+1329 chars]
